item.title: Connect to Docker daemon over ssh using docker-compose
item.description: One of the cool feature released with Docker 18.09 is the ability to connect to a docker daemon over ssh. This post would walk you through the steps to connect to a docker daemon running on DigitalOcean. To create a remote docker host we will use a tool called docker-machineÂ : 1 docker-machine create --driver DigitalOcean --digitalocean-access-token xxxx do-node2 Here is a detailed documentation about setting up a droplet on DigitalOcean.
